r_logentry->We've got a target in mind. Handle it, and you'll be compensated.
r_logentry->This one's caused enough trouble. Deal with them and earn your reward.
r_logentry->A reward awaits whoever brings this individual in.
r_logentry->We don't care how it's done. Just make sure it gets done.
r_logentry->Bring this one to justice, and you'll have our gratitude - and payment.
r_logentry->We're offering pay for results. No questions asked.
r_logentry->This individual has worn out their welcome. Time to collect.
r_logentry->Another name on the list. You know what to do.
r_logentry->Deal with this target swiftly, and the payout is yours.
r_logentry->Someone needs to be reminded actions have consequences. Make it happen.
r_logentry->We're not asking for questions, just results.
r_logentry->The price on this one should be motivation enough.
r_logentry->They crossed a line. You know what to do.
r_logentry->Someone's due a reckoning. We're paying for the delivery.
r_logentry->Handle this discreetly or loudly. Doesn't matter to us.
r_logentry->Job's yours if you want it. Target info uploaded.
r_logentry->Target is known. Contract is open. Make it quick.
r_logentry->If you’re looking for work, we’ve got something lined up.
r_logentry->They’ve stepped out of line. Time to restore order.
r_logentry->Payment’s ready. Just bring us what we asked for.
r_logentry->Someone’s overdue for a visit. Make it count.
r_logentry->The target’s location won’t stay quiet for long. Move fast.
r_logentry->Clean job, clean payout. Don't overthink it.
r_logentry->One target. One payment. First come, first served.
r_logentry->We’ve got eyes on a problem. Take care of it.
r_logentry->I assume we can trust you to handle this.
r_logentry->This is an authorized operation. Proceed as necessary.
r_logentry->I assume we can trust you to handle this.
